## Datacamp
</br>


- We are pleased to offer you the opportunity to improve your skills in statistical programming during this semester on [Datacamp](http://datacamp.com)!

- This offer is *optional*. 

    During the semester we will recommend courses that we feel are beneficial for revisiting and/or expanding on the `R` related material. 

- You are welcome to take other courses as well&mdash;you have access to the entire catalog for free!

- Please register [in our group](https://www.datacamp.com/groups/shared_links/d3a35282c24ce3d7103cf4b0d9e9e97f1113f057e45bb0151f76002ea10f0057) with your **@stud.uni-due.de** mail address.

## Assessment
</br>

- The examinations will be *oral*.

  You will present a (`R`-based) solution to a small case study assignment and answer further questions on topics covered in both lectures and tutorials in a subsequent discussion (40 minutes total).

- Tentative examination dates are July XX<sup>th</sup> and September XX<sup>st</sup>. Please see the [faculty page](https://www.wiwi.uni-due.de/studium/studienorganisation/pruefungen/pruefungstermine/) for updates.

- Please note that you **need** to register for the exams during the regular registration period via HISinOne.
